items.content_html: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.
items.title: Micropue/micropueUI: micropue UI is a dynamic web UI and utility library developed by MICROPUE. It uses javascript and css, and the package size is less than 150KB, which is very lightweight.The micropue UI provides a wealth of component and tool functions and classes. Please read the document.html document carefully before using it.

items.content_html: A real-time system for detecting violent activities in video streams using the MobileNetV2 model. It identifies violence in frames and sends automated email alerts to designated recipients. Lightweight, efficient, and scalable, this project is ideal for public safety, surveillance, and security applications, enhancing situational awareness.
items.title: Kunal1405/Violence-Detection-and-Email-Notification-System:  A real-time system for detecting violent activities in video streams using the MobileNetV2 model. It identifies violence in frames and sends automated email alerts to designated recipients. Lightweight, efficient, and scalable, this project is ideal for public safety, surveillance, and security applications, enhancing situational awareness.
